link-text: Science and Rollerskates: Day Six: I cannot even see the ground now. It has vanished in a tide...
link-description:
scienceandrollerskates:

Day Six: I cannot even see the ground now. It has vanished in a tide of flesh, both of those I have killed and those churned under the feet of their brethren. I have constructed a raft of the bodies of the boys who came before. It is disgusting, but it is sufficient. The hordes continue to come,…
